TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CivicAddressResolver extends System.Object implements class System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver
Public NotInheritable Class CivicAddressResolver Implements ICivicAddressResolver

summary.span: Fornisce la funzionalità per la risoluzione di un percorso basato sulle coordinate in un indirizzo civico.

span.span: Provides functionality for resolving a coordinate-based location to a civic address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il classe fornisce un'implementazione di che risolve un percorso basato su coordinate a un indirizzo civico se il provider di percorso fornisce sia coordinate sia dati civico.The class provides an implementation of that resolves a coordinate-based location to a civic address if the location provider provides both coordinates and civic address data. ## Examples Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo sincrono.The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)] Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo asincrono.The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come inizializzare una nuova istanza della classe .The following example shows how to initialize a new instance of the class. ```csharp CivicAddressResolver resolver = new CivicAddressResolver(); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Device.Location.CivicAddress ResolveAddress(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed
Public Function ResolveAddress (coordinate As GeoCoordinate) As CivicAddress

param.name: coordinate
param.span: Oggetto contenente la posizione da risolvere in un indirizzo civico.

span.span: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.

summary.span: Risolve in modo sincrono un indirizzo civico da un percorso basato sulla latitudine e la longitudine.

span.span: Synchronously resolves a civic address from a location based on latitude and longitude.

summary.span: La chiamata non bloccherà l'esecuzione del thread chiamante mentre viene risolto l'indirizzo.

span.span: This call will block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.
The civic address that is resolved from the parameter.

returns.span: Se non è possibile risolvere l'indirizzo viene restituito .

span.span: is returned if the address cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il evento viene generato al completamento dell'operazione di risoluzione di indirizzo.The event is raised when the address resolve operation completes. Indirizzo civico risolto dal `coordinate` restituito dal parametro di membro del oggetto passato al gestore dell'evento.The civic address that is resolved from the `coordinate` parameter is returned by the member of the object that is passed to the event handler. ## Examples Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo sincrono.The following program demonstrates how to call to resolve a civic address synchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/cs/resolvecivicaddresssync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressSync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddresssync/vb/resolvecivicaddresssync.vb#1)]

exception.span: non contiene valori validi di latitudine e longitudine.

span.span: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveAddressAsync(class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate coordinate) cil managed

param.name: coordinate
param.span: Oggetto contenente la posizione da risolvere in un indirizzo civico.

span.span: The containing the location to resolve to a civic address.

summary.span: Risolve un indirizzo in modo asincrono da una posizione basata su latitudine e longitudine.

span.span: Resolves an address asynchronously from a location that is based on latitude and longitude.

summary.span: La chiamata non blocca l'esecuzione del thread chiamante mentre l'indirizzo viene risolto.

span.span: The call does not block execution of the calling thread while the address is being resolved.

remarks.format: ## Examples Il programma seguente viene illustrato come chiamare per risolvere un indirizzo civico in modo asincrono.The following program shows how to call to resolve a civic address asynchronously. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/cs/resolvecivicaddressasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.resolvecivicaddressasync/vb/resolvecivicaddressasync.vb#1)]

exception.span: non contiene valori validi di latitudine e longitudine.

span.span: does not contain a valid latitude and longitude.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Event ResolveAddressCompleted As EventHandler(Of ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs)

summary.span: Si verifica quando la risoluzione dell'indirizzo iniziata da una chiamata a viene completata.

span.span: Occurs when the address resolution that was initiated by a call to completes.
